sprint_goal: Establish secure multi-tenant foundation and enable Salla store connectivity
key_deliverables: Auth Service, OAuth Flow, Webhook Handler, Data Sync Worker (Start)
demo_objectives: New user registration; Salla Store Connection flow
success_criteria: OAuth flow completes successfully; Auth service passes security tests
risk_factors: Salla API integration complexity; Recursive sync architecture validation
mitigation_strategies: Prototype recursive pattern early; Mock Salla API for testing

sprint_goal: Implement data pipeline and visualize core KPIs on the main dashboard
key_deliverables: ClickHouse Schema, CDC Pipeline, Analytics API, Dashboard UI
demo_objectives: Data flowing from Salla to Dashboard; KPI Charts rendering
risk_factors: CDC data consistency; OLAP query performance
mitigation_strategies: Implement data checksums; Materialized views in ClickHouse

sprint_goal: Deliver value via Abandoned Cart Recovery automation tools
key_deliverables: Email Editor, Cart Scheduler, AI Embedding Service
demo_objectives: Creating email template; Scheduling cart recovery campaign
success_criteria: Emails sent via QStash; Editor produces valid HTML
mitigation_strategies: Use stable TipTap builds; Sandbox email testing

sprint_goal: Implement advanced AI capabilities and forecasting features
demo_objectives: Asking AI questions about sales data; Viewing sales forecast
success_criteria: AI queries return accurate data; Security tests pass
risk_factors: AI Hallucination; Data leakage; Model costs
mitigation_strategies: Strict SQL parsing; Token usage limits; Caching
